snippet.title: Phantom Rose 2 Sapphire - PGS Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1964200/Phantom_Rose_2_Sapphire/
A skill-based roguelike deckbuilding game that takes the randomness out of card battles.
Phantom Rose 2 Sapphire will release on October 30, 2023.

Manage your cards carefully to outmaneuver your foes in this roguelike deckbuilder by solo dev and artist makaroll.

Experience Aria's journey through strategy-based card battles and the beautiful art drawn by makaroll himself.

- Official Website: https://phantomrosegame.com/#/
- Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/PhantomRoseGame
- PLAYISM Game Page: https://playism.com/en/game/phantom-rose-2-sapphire/

© Studio Maka LLC. Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.
